website_summaries.verdict: A good deal made by a company with a solid reputation. If you're looking to cover a larger room, however, check other models we considered.
pros: in the summer it cools, and in the winter it can be used to recirculate warm air that has risen to the ceiling
cons: Remote is included, but third-party options are available
A 6-inch downrod should be taken into account when fitting

website_summaries.verdict: The primary feature here is the unique “sword” fan blades, which both look and work great.
pros: “Sword” fan blades are striking and stylish
Easy to install and comes with great instructions
cons: This option doesn’t put out a whole lot of illumination
The fan can make a ticking noise and become a bit unbalanced at high speeds

customer_reviews.title: What a win!!
customer_reviews.text: At first, it was a little overwhelming when I (53 yo female) opened the box and saw all that I had to assemble and put it to the side; however, after a couple of weeks, I became brave, tackled it and made sure I stayed on the page I was supposed to be on. I laid everything out in front of me, left all little parts, nuts, bolts and screws in the little bags until it was their time. My 17 yo son installed it. End result, completely secure, no wobble, 4 speed levels, BEAUTIFUL!! I’d buy it all over again!
customer_reviews.author: Mon

customer_reviews.title: Works with wall switches!!
customer_reviews.text: No remote! Yay!! I didn’t want a remote because I wanted to operate it by just flipping the switch as I entered the room. Can’t do that if there is a remote. These days it’s almost impossible to find a nice looking fan without a remote. Looks great but it’s dim. Only 2 bulbs with a 40 watt limit. Pushing it a little by using 60 watt bulbs. Helped but not bright. A previous review mentioned a specific bulb he used to brighten it so I ordered them. They were GIANT. Way too big to fit this fan. He either mistyped the bulb type or he’s messing with people.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Curran

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice fan. I was a bit skeptical based on some reviews of a clicking sound. Note i found that a clicking sound comes from an unbalanced install or a screw that is not tighten properly. I ordered and installed 2 of them myself with no problems what so ever. They are perfectly balanced and blow lots of air for a 12 x 12 room. The original light bulbs provided are frosted and a bit on the dim side once the glass dome is installed.
customer_reviews.author: iMat

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, that’s about it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this fan about 2 years ago for our guest room. It was fine for a while, but then we started getting complaints from guests that this fan makes random clicking and knocking sounds, enough to wake people up. Initially we thought maybe our guests were extremely light sleepers, but then two similar fans from Westinghouse started doing the exact same thing in our bedroom. Poor construction, we’ve tried tightening everything in these fans to no avail. Steer clear if you will use your fan a lot or in a bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Verboom

customer_reviews.title: The air blowing is better than I have expected
customer_reviews.text: The air blowing is better than I have expected. The 2-blade fan is as good as the one with more blades. It moves more air than a bigger 3-blade fan I have. It's very nice looking and quiet also. One small complain is the two cheap 40-w lights which is out of favor these days and not bright either, replaced them with two 12W LED lights (you can search for "12W LED Candle Bulbs, 85 -100 Watt Light Bulbs Equivalent" on amazon). Also, there is no remote comes with it, not sure what the manufacture is thinking ... At least make it optional !
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed.
customer_reviews.text: The fan is noisy at med/high speeds, a very noticeable "helicopter blade" whooshing. I think that the whacky blade design is responsible for the noise. The thin metal motor housing, which came already installed, was bent at the base and scrapped the blade mounts. Had to take the fan down and bend the housing to miss the blade mounts. The candelabra lights limit the choice of LED lights to get a brighter output. Since the LEDs use much less current and generate much less heat, regular medium screw bases would allow one to choose almost any light level desired. Otherwise, it's a ceiling fan, but not a very good one for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gary L

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fan and very attractive
customer_reviews.text: This fan moves more air than any other ceiling fan I have installed in the last 40 yrs. It looks so nice my home. I will buy another one next spring. It’s extremely quiet. Make sure fan is level when installing and you won’t have any problems. Have now been using this fan and light for 9 mo. now, with 0 issues. I receive many positive comments regarding this fan. Recommend to everyone in need of One. You can purchase a remote, but I have not needed one.
customer_reviews.author: Awen

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: As many people mentioned before. I love the design and it works well, in terms of movement of air. My guests loved the design as well! Also, please read few other reviews in regards to the creaking noise. I did not install it, but rather a contractor. He did nice job installing it, but one of them had the noise. As many people suggested, I asked him to put the electrical tape around, (I just showed my contractor the review, and he understood it.) and it was gone! ##Update 06/01/2017## They still works well. Good air flow. We are glad to have them installed. (I purchased three of them about 2 years ago.)
customer_reviews.author: Hidden Dragon

customer_reviews.title: Looks as Good as Described
customer_reviews.text: This is really sharp ceiling fan. I have a house build in 1900 and have worked hard to keep the feature of the period while incorporating modern comforts. I'm am extremely happy with this fan. It's well crafted and solid, quiet while running, looks fantastic and was very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: S. Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and cools too!
customer_reviews.text: My main reason for choosing this fan was style. We wanted something a bit different and this is in our Great Room coffered ceiling. looks great, and works well. Very quiet too. In our case, we will probably never use the light, but it is adequate if needed. Most of the time is will be on low speed and circulating the conditioned air. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mort Adella

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, affordable and better than air conditioning
customer_reviews.text: Hot summer, no A/C, this is the ticket for a 12x16 bedroom. Made it so we could sleep at night, and much cheaper than A/C. A very stylish fan, it really dresses up the bedroom, and installation wasn’t too bad, just follow the directions. The only ding is the light is really dim. Replaced the included bulbs with some high output LEDs and that helped a lot, but the design would be 5 stars if they included a second light above the fan, maybe a small ring that could splash light off the ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: GearFlogger.net

customer_reviews.title: Now that I remember to write the review I forgot how to change the light bulb.
customer_reviews.text: That was the purpose of this post, so you wouldn't have to go through the same thing. Youtube, didn't have it, and I can't remember how I changed it. But, if you read my other posts, I'm sure it was my other personality who is much smarter than me. She is a selfish heffa...never shares her information!
customer_reviews.author: xtradinormal

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Manufactured Parts
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made. Apparently Westinghouse name no longer means quality. Hole threads on brackets were not drilled out properly and screws would not go in. One screw broke off trying to get it in. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Clyde & Shauna

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The assembly took quite a while longer than I expected. Once installed, It works great! On low speed, even in a very quiet room, it is difficult to hear and yet you can feel the breeze. The wind generated by only two blades is surprising. On high speed, there is a bit of a balance issue and it does make that ticking noise. Not a problem for me because I will never need the high speed, especially in a bedroom above the bed. It looks very attractive and invokes positive comments. I ordered the Westinghouse 7787500 wall remote and it works very well with this fan.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking
customer_reviews.text: The fan not only has a great looking contemporary design but Westinghouse sure has their act together when it comes to ease of installation. I've bought three of the Westinghouse fans (different styles) for our new home and will looking to buy a couple more to finish off the outside patio.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Nice breeze quality.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fan. Was easy to install. Like the previous said about possible noise after 6 months of use. I went ahead and placed a couple pieces of electrical tape where the mount and the bracket meet to eliminate the possibility of noise from un the future hopefully. The breeze is ver nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jacky De Suza

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic design. This is a serious eye-catcher
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic design. This is a serious eye-catcher. It runs very smooth, seems to be balanced perfectly.There is some MAJOR airflow coming from this guy. At first I was concerned that it wouldn't match the airflow of a more traditional 4 or 5 blade model, but all those concerns were.. blown away (see what I did there) when I cranked it up to high. I love the fact it has a traditional low setting, but then an "ultra-low" setting just to move the air around the room. I love this fan! I definitely intend to buy more for the rest of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Pollux and Castor

customer_reviews.title: The design is pretty cool but that's about all that is cool about ...
customer_reviews.text: Three stars because "it's ok" and not much more than that. The design is pretty cool but that's about all that is cool about it. It does not move a lot of air. We failed to notice that it does not come with a remote either and that's pretty much standard these days. Lastly, the light is not very bright, but worse than that, it is not led. All lighting should be by led's these days. I would not buy this product again, it needs to come in to the 21st century.
customer_reviews.author: bobelon

customer_reviews.title: Easy install with plenty of air
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a two blade fan for our son's room since he thinks they are cool. After reading several reviews on other similar fasns of blades coming detached and sent flying across the room, we stumbled upon this fan. The blades are attached at two points which means they are very secure. Installation took maybe 30 minutes and the directions were very straightforward. It not only looks great but pushes a nice amount of air as well.
customer_reviews.author: rojoloco

customer_reviews.title: No one who's been to our house has ever seen a two-bladed fan before
customer_reviews.text: This is quiet and looks expensive because it's not your usual 5-bladed tacky ceiling fan with the ugly light shades: who decided that's what reasonably priced ceiling fans should look like? We live in the Pacific Northwest, so a ceiling fan is never overworked, but it moves enough air for our purposes. It seems-well balanced, but we rarely have it on high, so I can't speak to the durability of it when overburdened. Other reviewers are right about the light, though: it's ridiculously dim. I didn't buy it for the light, so that's not a concern for us. If you need a light that will actually illuminate anything, this is not the fan for you.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Baskerville

customer_reviews.title: The overhead light needs to be upgraded to LEF
customer_reviews.text: We love the special, extraordinary 2-bladed fan. It’s not an ordinary fan such as a 4-bladed fan, but evokes positive comments from every one who sees and feels the air of the fan. The light is not strong enough for an overhead light so we plan on upgrading the incandescent lamps to LED. The fan is perfect to medium rooms such as a bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Piranha6

customer_reviews.title: The  built in light does not  work for more than a few days
customer_reviews.text: The built in pull chain light stopped working after a few days. Manufacture sent a replacemnet module and it works for a few days and started acting irradic until it again no longer works. Seems alike a poorly designed product. Fan works fine.
customer_reviews.author: joe gora

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking fan
customer_reviews.text: If you want something that doesn't look like everything else, these are cool. Well made and move plenty of air in the two bedrooms I put them in. Putting them together and installing them was about the same as any fan I've done so no big deal. My kids really like the look of these in their rooms. Both the bedrooms are about 15 x 15 and we have to keep the fan on medium or the kids grow ice cycles on their limbs.
customer_reviews.author: Bad Brad

customer_reviews.title: Overall A Nice Fan
customer_reviews.text: I like the fan and would give it 5 stars but the light cover is pretty flaky. It seems it is entirely too easy to get it on too tight to get it back off to replace the bulbs. Other than that, nice ceiling fan.
customer_reviews.author: robj101

customer_reviews.title: If I could give 10 stars, I would! 👌🏻
customer_reviews.text: My husband put three of these fans up today! He said they were by far the easiest fans he ever installed. He was also impressed with the quality. They give a beautiful flow in the room and are super quiet. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Attractive fan!
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this fan very attractive, it's unique design gets many positive comments. It really adds pizazz to our kitchen. While the look is very appealing, it also puts out a lot of air and has 4 air speeds instead of the usual 3. It also has a reverse switch for the wintertime. The only slight negative is that the light is quite dim so I replaced the bulbs. Still it isn't enough of an issue to warrant being downgraded. Do be careful with the globe though as I do not think a replacement globe is available, even at the Westinghouse website.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: If you install it properly you will be pleased with results improvement in lighting if you change out the bulb.
customer_reviews.text: Very quite and looks modern. Took a couple of hours since installation was at night. Instructions are fairly clear make sure to follow instructions on blade attachment to prevent any future wobbles. Price was reasonable. Will probably buy a couple more. Would recommend this to anyone. Light bulbs 40 watts + 2 keeps it from being a 5. I think you can replace the light bulbs with a a newer type bulb (halogen or other). Smaller base than the normal one.
customer_reviews.author: Poison Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Great fan! Couldn't be happier!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love LOVE this fan! Most efficient fan we found on the market. It works amazing and looks great. We have gotten more compliments on this fan than any other lighting we have put in our house. For a 2 blade fan with the amount of wattage, the cu ft of air movement is well above the standard in on the market. The only thing we did not like about this fan is that it comes with cheap incandescent bulbs. We changed these out for LED daylight bulbs and it works great, looks great and regulates the temperature in our home better than we hoped.
customer_reviews.author: M. Foust

customer_reviews.title: Best Fan I've Ever Owned
customer_reviews.text: Just installed this and it took about an hour (very easy). For only having two blades it puts off more air movement than most of my 3 blade units. Its extremely powerful. I recommend updating the bulbs as they aren't super bright. The unit is dimmable which is nice though. This fan also does not come with a remote, so be sure to purchase on when you buy this so you don't have to run out mid-installation and buy one. its very aesthetically pleasing and fits well in my modern bedroom. I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: The two blades on the fan also move an incredible amount of air about the space and it keeps the room cool in the summer
customer_reviews.text: I installed this fan in my living room over a year and half ago and have had no problems with it whatsoever. As others commented the bulbs that come with the fan are impractical. I found some cfl candelabra based bulbs that I use instead and is that light EVER bright. The two blades on the fan also move an incredible amount of air about the space and it keeps the room cool in the summer. I could not be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: triplev

customer_reviews.title: I decided to try my luck as I really love the look of the fan
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fan 2 months ago. I almost didn't because of some of the negative reviews pertaining to a clicking sound. I decided to try my luck as I really love the look of the fan. After having it installed I have not had one problem with it. It's extremely quiet, and provides really great air flow. The light is a bit dim, but I have it in my bedroom and so it's the perfect amount of light for me. Overall I couldn't be more happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A. Jurcak

customer_reviews.title: Very Unique!
customer_reviews.text: This fan is so cool looking. I bought it for my kitchen remodel and everyone comments on it. It's also very quiet and efficient! Would highly recommend for anyone looking for more than the run-of-the-mill fan without paying a high price.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Stelluto

customer_reviews.title: Modern fan
customer_reviews.text: Modern looking fan, didn't have a remote but I used the remote from the fan I was replacing. Took about 15 min to assemble and another 15 min to install.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful looking and so affordable, plus great performance!
customer_reviews.text: This fan was installed in our master bedroom and it is just so beautiful to look at! We purchased it because it was so affordable not expecting it to be such a wonderful product! I read the negative comments of earlier reviews but in our case, we don't spend the majority of our time in the bedroom. And the warmer weather hasn't arrived yet so maybe there will be an issue then but certainly up to this point, we would highly recommend it for ease of installation, price, and appearance, and so far, performance.
customer_reviews.author: MPB

customer_reviews.title: Nice Fan, Different Look
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, quiet operating fan. The reason I didn't give it five stars is because the color really isn't 'maple' - as indicated in the discription. Rather, the color of the blades is more of a 'dark walnut' as is shown in the picture. I actually used the blades that came with the fan as patterns as I cut new blades out of some nice 'Ash' veneer that I had. The light Ash color of the blades I made looked better with my decor.
customer_reviews.author: KentR

customer_reviews.title: The manufacturer's quality control is pretty shoddy. The fans themselves are cool to look ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these;1 fan has broken globe, 1 fan has no power chain! The manufacturer's quality control is pretty shoddy. The fans themselves are cool to look at and move good amount of air. I hope they clean up their act!!!
customer_reviews.author: Don Gurian

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and runs well!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this fan. Went in easy enough - we installed it ourselves. Runs quiet and is a beautiful addition to our bedroom. It makes it COLD on high at night! I pretty much keep it on medium. It's great! Wish it came in a 54inch as well as I love the style and want one in my larger family room!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Straight forwar assembly and install.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fan, extremely quite and the design is really efficient. Typically, the fan is on low or medium in the bedroom. High is way to much air volume for the bedroom. I have the fan paired with Meross switches and linked to Alexa. Love it !
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Polston

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, quiet, and terrible instructions.
customer_reviews.text: It's quiet, great looking, and energy efficient. The bulbs put off sufficient lighting for a bedroom, though not enough for say an office. Note: flat pack by ikea has fewer parts to put together than this fan! The directions aren't the clearest. None of the pieces/parts are labeled, so I had to figure it out. Took longer to assemble and install b/c for those reasons. HOWEVER, I did it alone and this is my first time installing a ceiling fan (though I'm fairly handy).
customer_reviews.author: G & A

customer_reviews.title: Do not stair at slow moving fan too long.
customer_reviews.text: This fan moves air very well look good and is mesmerizing at a slow speed
customer_reviews.author: Detpete

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool, works great
customer_reviews.text: These 2 little blades work better than the 5 blade fan in my bedroom. Spins in both directions. 4 speed settings, which is great because I love the slowest setting for a sleepy breeze. Overall works really great and looks very cool! Only negatives are that the light is pretty weak so you'll have to get a better light bulb than the one that comes with it and that the pull strings are too short for me, like all ceiling fans (I'm 5'6).
customer_reviews.author: D.E.

customer_reviews.title: It is fantastic looking and I get many compliments on it
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to replace the one in our kitchen/dining room area. The light is sufficient for the space but we have other lighting in the rooms as well. It is fantastic looking and I get many compliments on it. It also moves a lot of air for having the two blades. It is also quiet and does not wobble at all.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine McMahon

customer_reviews.title: Good price, good quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice looking fan. It has a modern design and overall I am pleased. I bought 2 and had them installed by a professional. There was an issues w/ one of them - there was that clicking noise that others had complained about, but after a few days it seems to go away. And there was initially some shaking of the fan on the highest speed which I was concerned about, but we were able to tighten one of the metal pieces on the blades and it seems to be better now. Overall very happy. With the price it is well worth it. And the light is good for a bedroom space too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but shaky!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful look easy to install. Took about 1 hr. With assembly. A bit funky on the balance issue. Very difficult to get it right. I still can't put it on high because it starts to shake so bad. Level 3 still puts out a good bit of air.
customer_reviews.author: Shane s

customer_reviews.title: They give off an amazing amount of wind
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these fans: They look stunning, and completely at home with my mid-century decor. They give off an amazing amount of wind. The lights are, as others have said, a bit on the dimmer side, but fine as an overhead bedroom light. You will still need to turn on a lamp to read. They were so simple to install. Note there is no remote, although I think you can hook one up separately. You will not go wrong with these fans! Go get it!
customer_reviews.author: Karen P.

customer_reviews.title: We could not be more pleased with the product
customer_reviews.text: Just completed installation in a guest bedroom using Amazon's handyman service. We could not be more pleased with the product. The fan is attractive and quite while moving a lot of air. My wife commented that the fan did not overpower the small room in its appearance.
customer_reviews.author: D. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Bought for rental house
customer_reviews.text: It works great and looks really cool. Everyone I showed it to thought is was cool too. Tenants loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Stevey49

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and efficient
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and the room cooling performance of this fan.
customer_reviews.author: music girl

customer_reviews.title: Very modern looking
customer_reviews.text: Installed fairly easy. Just make sure it mounts solid. The light could definitely be brighter if using as a room light. Looking into replacing the bulbs. Otherwise, the fan moves a lot of air for only two blades and we get a lot of comments how cool looking it is. Liked it enough to order two more for other rooms.
customer_reviews.author: wildwns

customer_reviews.title: Nice fan, no remote
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking item and looks to be well made. I was expecting a remote unit but this one comes with pull-chains. I purchased a remote sender which added to the cost but now I have what I want.
customer_reviews.author: beezageeza

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: I have a traditional house but wanted to do something different with the ceiling fan. It doesn't match but I do love it. It is a great design and puts out a lot of air. Only complaint--light bulbs provided aren't strong enough. I replaced them with LED's.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Jones

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Very cool fan. I installed in my 12x16 foot bedroom and it moves plenty of air and it's pretty quite. I also used a universal remote from Westinghouse that worked perfect I am very pleased
customer_reviews.author: hesquib

customer_reviews.title: Smooth And quiet and classy.
customer_reviews.text: This fan is just beautiful. I loved it so much I bought another one! Really nice. Very classy. Helps get that heat off the ceiling and into the room! It quiet and smooth. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: joann williams

customer_reviews.title: This looks great installed! Wife wasn't convinced until it was on ...
customer_reviews.text: This looks great installed! Wife wasn't convinced until it was on the ceiling. High quality and easy install. Like most fans, light is minimal-it doesn't fill a small room (10*12).
customer_reviews.author: B. K.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the fan and so does my wife... my wife actually picked it out, I ordered it and installed it and I like the fan way better than I thought I would! Excellent buy for an excellent price... Will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Chris & Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money,should be with remote.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good 👍 and is quiet ,but I wish the low speed was slower. No need to use medium because is too fast and starts wobbling.
customer_reviews.author: REGINA

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking and they work
customer_reviews.text: Installed two of these two weeks ago in my living room. They look fantastic. They're actually easier to put together because there's only two blades instead of 4 or 5. The light is dim so don't expect it to light a whole room. I'm looking for brighter bulbs at the moment. They are quiet and move a lot of air surprisingly. Nice product and style
customer_reviews.author: PowerStroker

customer_reviews.title: Harmony Light Fan
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my bedroom. Looks and works great. My husband said it has very good instructions. He said it was pretty easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: W. S. O'Toole

customer_reviews.title: Best ceiling fan
customer_reviews.text: This is the best ceiling fan, I have ever owned, kicks out nice cool to cold air on the hot days, it's the right length to the ceiling, and very nice to look at with its unique blade design. Easy to install, since this was a replacement fan. Now I'm thinking of replacing all the ceiling fans with this fan.
customer_reviews.author: Yo

customer_reviews.title: Not a home run, but a decent fan.
customer_reviews.text: The light is very lack luster. But the look of the fan is pretty cool. Also, sometimes makes noise when fan on, others it doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Halocene

customer_reviews.title: This fan doesn't have the remote control. Now a ...
customer_reviews.text: This fan doesn't have the remote control. Now a days even a normal fan has the remote. I didn't check at the time of purchase and I thought default it will have it. My daughter don't want to fix in her room with our remote. I am little upset and there is no return policy on this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It moves air well in the 20 x 12 man cave and the light is perfect using the supplied bulbs for the ambiance I wanted ...
customer_reviews.text: highly unique and very functional. It moves air well in the 20 x 12 man cave and the light is perfect using the supplied bulbs for the ambiance I wanted in this room. I get a lot of compliments and visitors are surprised on the quiet operation.
customer_reviews.author: Hazeman

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful yet stylish,simple to install.you can upgrade to remote. Originally installed the remote control feature (different brand) but motor doesn't work, able to return but installation and removing is wasted of time. I suggest buy this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando Sullera

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! Bought it for our new house and my fiancé was spectical because of it only have two blades but he has admitted I was right and it works perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis S

customer_reviews.title: Modern touch, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice modern fan with easy to follow instructions. Took about 25-30 minutes to install by myself. Only drawback is a slight clicking noise sometimes. I believe it is the housing shifting and settling. Otherwise, it is very quiet and sits right above our bed on an 8' ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: bobby

customer_reviews.title: Nice style, but low light
customer_reviews.text: Love the style of this fan. Light is a little dim. I put in 75w equivalent LEDs and it is still a little darker than I would like in my office. However, the style is really nice and I can add light if I really need it through other means.
customer_reviews.author: Berwin

customer_reviews.title: Contempory Fan
customer_reviews.text: This is a sharp looking fan. My only negative comment would be the light is not as bright as I would like it to be for the bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Bart

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful to look at but noise when used in any ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful to look at but noise when used in any level other than the minimum. Also doesn't work efficiently and the light flickers. Don't waste your money, I not only paid the price here but the electrician fee to install it. Awful!
customer_reviews.author: Florence Harth Carter

customer_reviews.title: IMPRESSIVE FAN
customer_reviews.text: WE BOUGHT FOR OUR POOL ROOM FOR OVER THE POOL TABLE. AM VERY EMPRESSES WITH HOW MUCH AIR THIS FAN MOVES. WAS EASY TO INSTALL AND IS HEAVY DUTY.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: It has very nice air moving capabilities
customer_reviews.text: This is the ultimate man cave fan. The fan spinning looks just plain dangerous. It has very nice air moving capabilities. Bulbs that come with it are dimmer than expected. 4 speed fan totally rocks with the extra speed. I installed brighter LED bulbs rather than use the dim ones it came with.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something stylish but also functional. Well I got both with this amazing fan. So much so that I'm considering purchasing another one for my bedroom. Easy installation and very quite! This thing really does move a lot of air throughout my large 12x14 foot home office.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Westinghouse 7214100 Harmony Two- Light 48 inch fan is fine with me.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I did not give it a 5 star rating is because I was not expecting to buy another piece for it to be flush mounted to the ceiling. . Other then that I love the fan. It puts out more then an ample amount of air and the light is bright enough. My guy installed it very quickly without any problems. Delivery was quick. I have had compliments from all that have seen it. Very happy with my purchase and wold recommend it. I am alright with the pull chains.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This fan is a very stylish fan that is also functional. This fan moves the air and it is super quiet, great for low ceilings . The fan was installed by an electrician and it installed in no time without the remote, that would be an unnecessary expense. Put this in the room with guests they'll love it.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Durant

customer_reviews.title: Obnoxious noises
customer_reviews.text: Keeps room cool but has loud obnoxious clicking and rattling noises. Wish I could return it. Be warned.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: We love it and so did contractor who installed fan on ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally had this fan installed. We love it and so did contractor who installed fan on light switch and light on dimmer. Great update to our home!
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fan moves allot of air
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy installation but the light doesn't work. The fan works but not the light. The globe is on pretty tight so I'll need a second pair of hands to screw it off and check the bulbs. Fingers crossed that's the issue.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bray

customer_reviews.title: Fun and funky
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan. It is quiet and looks amazing. I have only had it for a couple of days but truly enjoy it. Everyone that has seen it likes how different it is too. I would recommend this product to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: pam

customer_reviews.title: Westinghouse Harmony two blade fan.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best fan ever. It is stylish, efficient and quiet. It really circulates the air and makes the room comfortable. We used the 13 watt cfl bulbs and it gives plenty of light. Installation was easy, even with our cat helping! Highly recommend this fan.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Longer assembly but awesome fan
customer_reviews.text: I like this fan. It's quiet and is pretty well balanced. The assembly and installation was very different to the other 6 fans I installed in the house that day, and took slightly longer, but the end result is a stunning fan that is quiet and moves air very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoned

customer_reviews.title: Liked this fan with 3 comments
customer_reviews.text: We are happy with this fan and like the styling. It's very quiet and gives a good breeze (something I thought we might sacrifice for the 2 blade styling). 3 comments: (1) I do wish that you could adjust the drop to make it more flush to the ceiling. It drops a little lower than we'd like. (2) I wish that it came with a remote control but you can see from the comments, that you can buy one separately. We didn't want to deal with the extra step. (3) Nice touch to have the icons on the pull strings so that you know which is for the light and which is for the fan.
customer_reviews.author: Best in a Vest

customer_reviews.title: I'm really disappointed in the fan speed and power
customer_reviews.text: I'm really disappointed in the fan speed and power. Not for a second I believe the CFM number published in here. At top speed, you have to stand right below the fan to feel any air flow
customer_reviews.author: SAMerica

customer_reviews.title: and are not disappointed. Nice fan
customer_reviews.text: We had tried two different ceiling fans in our daughters room, and both only lasted a couple months, so we went back to faithful Westinghouse, and are not disappointed. Nice fan, functions well, and so far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan! what it doesn't show are hand controls from the sides. It's the most quiet fan I have ever had! The one I had before had a whirring noise, this just the noise of the moving air! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Stacyh

customer_reviews.title: Good airflow and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I got four of these for our house last june. It has been a few months. Runs quiet. Good airflow and stylish. I have had no issues with any of them.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Great fan! Liked it so much I bought another. It's quiet, I actually feel breeze from it and it keeps up on high speed quite well with just a touch of shuddering. It's modern looking. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: K. Barlow

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Fan
customer_reviews.text: This fan is really cool looking. Installed easily and makes no motor noise. Light was definately not bright enough. I found led candelabra bulbs on Amazon that were low wattage and provided a much more light.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: This is The One
customer_reviews.text: A little different design, took a bit to figure out install compared to others. But once up! Super quiet, super air push!
customer_reviews.author: BruceWayne

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL!
customer_reviews.text: It is SO beautiful and different from the usual. I do love it. It seems to move more air than the old four bladed fan. The light is fine for my needs. I will have to see if it's difficult to replace the bulb in the future, but I doubt it will be really hard to do.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce C

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not well built
customer_reviews.text: Fan looks very pretty, bought 2 of these. But both fans are very noisy. Had to replace both fans due to noise. Even the bulbs stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: REJIALEX

customer_reviews.title: ... on the look of this fan and it works good too.
customer_reviews.text: I get multiple compliments on the look of this fan and it works good too.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome, like a spaceship
customer_reviews.text: Looks awesome, like a spaceship. The fan is very quiet and works great. The light is somewhat dim because it only takes two candle-style bulbs under the frosted dome.
customer_reviews.author: catapultKT

customer_reviews.title: Not too much power
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice item, but it does not have enough power to blow air on high speed.
customer_reviews.author: reader

customer_reviews.title: I love how modern it looks
customer_reviews.text: I love how modern it looks, everyone comments on it, fits perfectly with our house decor, cools the room well also
customer_reviews.author: kristy

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice fan! I had a small
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice fan! I had a small, dim ceiling fan in my dining room that desperately needed to be replaced. I thought about going with a three or four light fan, but decided to go with this one because it's so different. It puts out a decent amount of light for a dome style light and a surprising amount of air movement even at shower speeds.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C

customer_reviews.title: These fans look fantastic in the bedrooms
customer_reviews.text: These fans look fantastic in the bedrooms! They also provide lots of air flow. I will buy again when and if I need one in another room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eye catching fan
customer_reviews.text: This fan circulates a great more than you would expect from a fan with two blades. Very happy with the look. Everyone who sees it has complimented us and asked where we got it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Greaves

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This fan is exactly what we needed. Everything about it is just right!
customer_reviews.author: Elda Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fan - excellent value.
customer_reviews.text: Very elegant looking and really moves air. Nice complement to our Mid Century Modern decor and extremely quiet while running. Very good buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: R. Koenig

customer_reviews.title: Ceiling fan.
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how silent this fan is and how much air it moves. We mounted it in a fairly small room which has our TV in it which adds quite a bit of heat and this fan really is making a difference. Glad we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Menard

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality fan for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality fan for the price. Installation was easy, but follow the directions for proper placement of each part.The fan moves plenty of air for the space I installed it for (about 13ft x 10ft).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon B2

product_meta.title: Westinghouse Lighting 7231100 Harmony Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light, 48 Inch, Brushed Nickel
product_meta.description:
Style:LED Light Kit| Color:Brushed NickelThe Westinghouse 48 inch Harmony 2 blade ceiling fan has a refined, contemporary look that balances style with performance. The clean, cutting-edge modern ceiling fan design is finished in brushed nickel with an integrated opal frosted glass light fixture, and two weathered maple blades in a distinctive shape. This 48 inch ceiling fan with light fixture includes integrated dimmable LED as an energy-efficient source of illumination that eliminates the need to change bulbs. Product reference number 72311.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Westinghouse ceiling fans are stylish enough to complement any décor. The timeless and distinctive design of the 56-inch English manor ceiling fan will add a touch of elegance to any room. This ceiling fan features a pewter patina finish with reversible plywood blades in mahogany/light maple. It includes a light fixture with frosted white alabaster glass shades and uses four candelabra base torpedo or G16-1/2 light bulbs (60 watt maximum). Complement everything from wallpaper to upholstery with the classic look of an English manor ceiling fan.
feature_bullets: Indoor 48 inch LED ceiling fan with light, down rod only installation ideal for large rooms up to 225 square feet (15 feet by 15 feet)
Brushed nickel ceiling fan finish weathered maple finish blades, light kit with opal frosted glass includes two candelabra base 4. 5 watt B11 LED bulbs
Westinghouse ceiling fans feature a high-quality motor, deliver powerful air movement and quiet performance with a reverse function for summer/winter operation
Fan Performance on High Speed Airflow: 4611 CFM, Energy Usage: 56 W without lights, Airflow Efficiency: 83 CFM/W
Lifetime motor and two-year on all other parts

specifications.Usage: Ceiling fan with light, Ceiling fan with lights, Indoor ceiling fan, Led ceiling fan
specifications.Included Components: Ceiling Fan, Mounting Hardware, Instruction Manual
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars388 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
